channel.title: Help with exp
channel.description: Ok so I am having trouble editing my exp gain for attack strength and so on....... I don't know what to look for because every time you hit a 1 you get so and so exp. Then when you hit a 1 again you get another completely random ammount of exp........ So what the hell am I supposed to search for and what would I change. Please help me lol? I'm a noob when it comes to this stuff....

item.title: Help with exp
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Lol I was going out of my mind with confusion because id hit like 5 and take the xp i got and divide it bby 5 then saerch for that number and id never find anything lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with exp
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

hitDiff is better, since it’s experience per hit*the number you hit.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with exp
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

I don’t know which one you are looking for but if it is npcs look for

TotalExp = (double)(

After the (double) there is a random number like 250 * 2. The 2 means double, the 250 means how much exp you get per hit. 250 times 2 is 500. That’s what you get per 1 hit. Just change the numbers but NOT THE 2. Sometimes it isn’t a 2 though it’s sometimes called hitdif

Read full topic
